summary:
Skugga Yxa, a large daedra companion. 
Requires Skyrim Monster Mod and possible Monster Wars
descriptionHtml:
-----Description-----

I had been looking through Nexus for a cool monster companion. I ,however, could never find one. Then I ran across Skyrim Monster Mod, and decided to take a look at some monsters and decided to make my own companion.

I came up with Skugga Yxa (Shadow Axe), which I though fit him well. He uses the OrcMale voice (hence the orc stronghold dialogue option) because it was the most suited to my liking out of the voices available to use for creating followers.

This is my first follower mod so I hope you enjoy it and give it a chance.

----Location----

Until I create my own location for him, he\\\'ll be found at the Guardian Stones.

----Requirements-----

Skyrim Monster Mod
(possibly) Monster Wars

----Credit----

Credit goes to the original author of Skyrim Monster Mods, and to the current author of Skyrim Monster Mod and Monster Wars

----Permissions-----

Since the models are not my own, I recommend asking the author of the required mods first before using this in your own mods.

----Helpful Tips from comments----

 \"if someone want use this mod and dont want install monster mod, you can use the resource .esm provided from optional files in monster mod. Install full monster mod and after install the resource file or, like me, install after the lore version .esm or any patch you need\" - Masacroso
author: DragonCourier
